empty-field: Warns the user that they are yet to fill in a field.
profile-item-more: Label to expand and show more items in a list (e.g., profile sections).
complete-your-profile: Encourages the user to complete their profile
auth-dialog-content: Warns the user that they will be redirected to the unified login feature of the Meta-Wiki.
auth-dialog-button-close: Allows the user to close the tab
navbar-link-organizations: Link to the second section of the landing page, which provides information about the CapX project
navbar-link-saved-profiles: Link to the list of saved profiles
navbar-link-profiles: Link to the list of user's profiles
navbar-link-capacities: Link to the capacities page on navigation bar
navbar-link-events: Link to the events page on navigation bar
navbar-link-dark-mode: Toggle between dark and light mode
body-home-section01-title-carousel: Comma-separated list of short words used by the typewriter animation and inserted into $1 of the template. Keep them concise (e.g., nouns) and separated by commas. Example: 'capacity, knowledge, skills, services'.
body-home-section01-title-template: Parameterized template for the animated title on the first section of the home page. Must contain the placeholder $1 where the rotating word(s) from the carousel will be inserted. Translators can reorder words around $1 to follow their language's grammar.
body-home-section01-description: Text displayed on the first section of the home page. Describes the purpose of the platform, inviting users to connect, learn, and share capacities.
body-home-section01-button: Button displayed on the first section of the home page. Invites users to join the platform.
body-home-section01-about-button: Link to the second section of the landing page, which provides information about the CapX project
body-home-main-section-carrousel-descrip: Text to be displayed beside the Wikimedia projects logos on the landing page
body-home-section01-call-to-action-title: Title text to be displayed at the second section of the landing page
body-home-section01-call-to-action-descr: Text to be displayed at the second section of the landing page, right below the previous title text
body-home-section01-call-to-action-butto: Button displayed on the first section of the home page. Invites users to join the platform.
Link to the Meta-Wiki account creation page
body-home-video-section-title: Title text to be displayed at the end of the first section of the landing page
body-home-feature-section-capacity: Text to be displayed below the Wikimedia projects logos
body-home-feature-section-connect: Text to be displayed below the Wikimedia projects logos
body-home-feature-section-knowledge: Text to be displayed below the Wikimedia projects logos
body-loggedin-home-main-section-title: Title text at the top of the home page body
body-loggedin-home-main-section-descript: Text below title text at the top of the home page body
body-loggedin-home-main-section-button02: Link to the user's profile on navigation bar
body-loggedin-home-third-section-title: Section title for the "Suggestions and Feedback" feature on the home page body
body-loggedin-home-third-section-button: Button text for the "Suggestions and Feedback" feature; it'll copy the email 'capx@wmnobrasil.org' to the user's clipboard
body-loggedin-home-third-section-button-: Snackbar informing user that the e-mail has been successfully copied to clipboard
body-profile-birthday-title: Where user will inform their wiki birthday
body-profile-box-title-wikidata-item: Where user will inform their Wikidata item to be linked
body-profile-box-title-alt-wiki-acc: Where user will select their alternative accounts (if they have one)
body-profile-section-title-territory: Where user will select their territory
body-profile-section-title-affiliation: Where user will select their affiliation
body-profile-section-title-main-projects: Section title text for Main projects
body-profile-section-affiliation-dropdow: Instructs user to select their organization
profiency-level-not-proficient: Allows user to signalize that they are not proficient in the selected language.
profiency-level-basic: Allows user to signalize that they have basic knowledge of the selected language.
profiency-level-intermediate: Allows user to signalize that they have intermediate knowledge of the selected language.
profiency-level-advanced: Allows user to signalize that they have advanced knowledge of the selected language.
profiency-level-almost-native: Allows user to signalize that they are almost native in the selected language.
profiency-level-professional: Allows user to signalize that they have professional proficiency in the selected language.
profiency-level-native: Allows user to signalize that they are native in the selected language.
organization-profile-project-link: Field label for the project URL
organization-profile-event-url-title: Title text for the URL field
organization-profile-event-name: Field label for the event name
organization-profile-event-title-of-even: Field label for the event title
organization-profile-event-organized-by: Title text for the 'Organized by' field
organization-profile-event-start-date: Title text for the event start time field
organization-profile-event-end-date: Title text for the event end time field
organization-profile-event-format: Title text for the event format field
organization-profile-event-description: Field label for the event description
organization-profile-event-description-t: Explains what to include in the event description (objectives, people involved, key topics).
organization-profile-click-here: Inline link prompting the user to click to proceed (contextual action)
organization-profile-add-a-diff-tag: Action to add Diff tags related to the organization
organization-profile-event-choose-capaci: Button to open capacity selection for the event
organization-profile-report-activities-t: Section title for the report of activities
organization-profile-provide-meta-link: Instruction to provide a Meta-wiki link to the activity report
organization-profile-open-project: Action link/button to open the project
organization-profile-view-event: Action link/button to view the event
organization-profile-view-document: Action link/button to view the document
organization-profile-no-image-available: Fallback text when no image is available
organization-list-alt-banner: Alt text for the organization list banner image
organization-list-banner-page: Page title for the Organization list
edit-profile-use-letsconnect: Heading introducing the Let's Connect integration
lets-connect-import-data-title: Dialog title to import data from Let's Connect
lets-connect-import-data-description: Explains the consequences of importing Let's Connect data into the CapX profile
snackbar-lets-connect-import-success: Snackbar informing the user that Let's Connect data was imported successfully
body-profile-edit-organization-button: Allows user to edit the organization profile
body-profile-edit-user-button: Allows user to edit their own profile
logo-not-available: Fallback text when an organization's logo is not available
body-profile-section-title-wanted-capaci: Section title text for Wanted capacities
body-profile-section-title-known-capacit: Section title text for Known capacities
body-profile-section-title-available-cap: Section title text for Available capacities
body-profile-section-title-contact: Section title text for the Contact options
body-profile-section-title-contacts: Section title text for Contact methods
footer-link-documentation: Link to the documentation page in the footer
footer-link-github:
{{Optional}}
Link to the GitHub repository in the footer
footer-link-wikimedia: Link to the Meta-Wikimedia page in the footer
footer-privacy-policy: Link to the Privacy policy page in the footer
footer-translate-link: Link to the translatewiki.net page for Capacity Exchange in the footer
aria-label-profile-selector: Accessible label for the profile selection dropdown
body-profile-known-capacities-title: Section title text for Known capacities
body-profile-available-capacities-title: Where user will list their available capacities
body-profile-wanted-capacities-title: Where user will list their wanted capacities
body-profile-wikimedia-projects-title: Where user will list the Wikimedia projects they contribute to
body-profile-contact-button: Banner text with a link to send the user a message.
body-profile-copy-link: Button text for the "Copy (profile) link" feature on the user profile
body-profile-copy-link-success: Snackbar informing user that the profile link has been successfully copied to clipboard
body-profile-copy-link-error: Snackbar informing user that there was an error copying the profile link to clipboard
aria-label-video-player: Accessible label for the introduction video player
video-fallback-message: Fallback message shown when the browser does not support embedded video
aria-label-open-video: Accessible label for the button that opens the video player
video-show-transcript: Button label to show the video transcript
video-hide-transcript: Button label to hide the video transcript
aria-label-toggle-transcript: Accessible label for toggling the video transcript
aria-label-video-transcript: Accessible label for the video transcript section
edit-profile-update: Button that updates the current data in the form
edit-profile-welcome: Welcoming text at the top of edit profile page
edit-profile-image-title: Where user will select a profile image
edit-profile-choose-avatar: Where user will select an avatar
edit-profile-use-wikidata-photograph: Checkbox/option to display Wikidata item photograph on the profile
edit-profile-use-wikidata-item: Checkbox/option to display the Wikidata item on the profile
edit-profile-consent-wikidata-link: Preceded by {{msg-wm|Capex-edit-profile-consent-wikidata-before-link}} or {{msg-wm|Capex-edit-profile-consent-wikidata-item-before-link}}. Followed by {{msg-wm|Capex-edit-profile-consent-wikidata-after-link}} or {{msg-wm|Capex-edit-profile-consent-wikidata-item-after-link}}.
edit-profile-save: Allows user to save edits to profile
edit-profile-cancel: Allows user to cancel edits to profile
edit-profile-mini-bio: Where user will write their short bios
edit-profile-mini-bio-tooltip: Further explains field purpose, including guiding questions for possible expected information
edit-profile-select-skills: Instructs user to select skills they have from a pre-set directory.
edit-profile-add-capacities: Action button to add the capacities
edit-profile-available-capacities: Instructs user to select skills that are available to share from the ones they listed in the "known capacities" field.
edit-profile-wanted-capacities: Instructs user to select skills that they are willing to learn from a pre-set directory.
edit-profile-language-tooltip: Instructs user to select the languages they are capable of contributing.
edit-profile-add-language: Allows user to add a language
edit-profile-main-projects: Section title text for the main projects
edit-profile-add-projects: Allows user to add the projects that they contribute to
edit-profile-add-events: Allows user to add the events that they contribute to
edit-profile-display-events: Allows user to display main events of their organization
edit-profile-share-username: Allows user to share other Wikimedia usernames they may have
edit-profile-territory: Allows user to state their geographic location
edit-profile-display-links: Allows user to display links of their organization's activities
edit-profile-wikidata-item: Allows user to use their Wikidata item image
edit-profile-delete-profile-confirm: Allows user to confirm profile deletion
edit-profile-delete-profile-cancel: Allows user to cancel profile deletion
capacity-card-explore-capacity: Allows user to explore a specfic capacity
capacity-card-expand-capacity: Allows user to expand capacity and check its details
capacity-card-info: Allows user to see information about the capacity
capacity-search-placeholder: Placeholder explaining capacity search bar purpose
capacity-banner-title: Banner text for the "Capacity Directory" page
privacy-policy-alt-banner: Alt text for the privacy policy banner image
privacy-policy-banner: Page banner title for the Privacy policy
privacy-policy-title: Main title of the Privacy policy page
privacy-policy-capacity-exchange-text: Introductory paragraph describing hosting, coordination, and licensing. Contains placeholders $1 (coordinator), $2 (platform), $3 (terms).
privacy-policy-link-wiki-moviment-brazil: Label for the link to Wikimedia Brasil
privacy-policy-link-toolforge: Label for the link to Toolforge
privacy-policy-link-cloud-service-terms-: Label for the link to the Cloud Service Terms of use
privacy-policy-private-information-intro: Introductory sentence before listing retained private information
privacy-policy-private-information-topic: List item: OAuth credentials that allow partial access (placeholder $1 for 'OAuth')
List item: User-authored mini bio stored on profile
privacy-policy-private-information-text0: Explains how a user can delete their own profile
Explains how an organization manager can clear data and be removed as manager
Mentions that data use is governed by WMCS Terms and GDPR compliance (placeholder $1)
capacity-selection-modal-select-capacity: Allows user to select a capacity from the list
capacity-selection-modal-no-capacities-f: Informs user that no capacities have been found for that particular category
capacity-selection-modal-see-more-inform: Allows user to see more information
capacity-selection-modal-hover-view-capa: Allows user to see the capacity in the Capacity Feed page
capacity-selection-modal-select-capacity: Allows user to select a capacity from the list
capacity-selection-modal-selected: Status label indicating a capacity is selected
capacity-selection-modal-loading: Text to be displayed while capacities of a category load
privacy-policy-private-information-text0: Link label: Wikimedia Cloud Service Terms of use
events-filters-applied: Text displayed when filters are applied; it'll be followed by a list of filters that the user has selected
filters-search-by-capacities: Search placeholder/label to search by capacities
aria-label-search-by-capacities: Accessible label for the capacities search input
filters-capacities: Label for the Capacities filter group
filters-show-results: Action button to apply filters and show results
filters-clear-all: Action button to clear all selected filters
filters-territory-title: Label for the Territories filter group
filters-add-territory: Action to add a territory filter
filters-exchange-with: Label for the 'Exchange with' filter group
filters-title: Title for the Filters panel or modal
filters-affiliations: Label for the Affiliations filter group
filters-add-affiliation: Action to add an affiliation filter
feed-no-data-message: Informs user that no data has been found for the selected filters
feed-no-data-description: Encourages user to use different filters or return later
profile-incomplete: Badge or header indicating a profile is incomplete
snackbar-edit-profile-success: Snackbar informing the user that the profile was updated successfully
snackbar-edit-profile-failed-generic: Generic error snackbar when updating profile fails
snackbar-capacity-validation-available-w: Validation message indicating available capacities must be a subset of known capacities
snackbar-capacity-validation-conflict: Validation message indicating conflicts between available and known capacities
snackbar-edit-profile-organization-delet: Snackbar: error deleting an organization event
Snackbar: error deleting an organization project
snackbar-edit-profile-organization-updat: Snackbar: error updating an organization event
snackbar-edit-profile-organization-creat: Snackbar: error creating an organization event
snackbar-edit-profile-organization-max-d: Snackbar: user reached the maximum number of documents allowed (4)
snackbar-edit-profile-organization-max-p: Snackbar: user reached the maximum number of projects allowed (4)
snackbar-submit-report-bug-success-title: Snackbar: success submitting bug report; instructs where to track it
saved-profiles-delete-success: Snackbar: profile removed from saved list
saved-profiles-add-success: Snackbar: profile added to saved list
saved-profiles-error: Snackbar: generic error while saving/removing profile
snackbar-submit-message-success-title: Snackbar: message submitted successfully; points to the 'Sent' tab
edit-profile-organization-logo-help: Instructs user on how to edit organization logo
edit-profile-no-image: Informs user that no image is currently selected
events-banner-title: Page title for the Events page
organization-profile-event-popup-close-o: A “modal” is a modal dialog box, which is a window that stops the user from clicking anything outside it before it is closed.
organization-profile-event-popup-create-: Action button to create a new event
events-search-placeholder: Placeholder text for the event search box
events-available-capacities: Title text of section where available capacities will be displayed
events-search-results: Text displayed when a search is requested; it'll be followed by the number of results found (even if none are found)
events-search-results-singular: Text displayed when one event is found; it'll follow the number of results found
events-search-results-plural: Text displayed when any number (except for 1) of events is found; it'll follow the number of results found
events-search-results-no-results: Text to be displayed in case no events are found.
events-no-results-with-filters: Text to be displayed in case no events match the selected filters, with an encouragement for the user to remove some filters.
events-no-results: Message shown when there are no available events
events-search-results-error: Text to be displayed if an error occurs. Encourages user to try again.
events-banner-alt: Alt text for the events banner image
organization-profile-hide-event: Action to hide an event from display
organization-profile-event-search: Label for search input in the event dialog/modal
saved-profiles-title: Heading of the Saved profiles page
saved-profiles-delete-item: Action to delete an item from saved profiles
saved-profiles-view-profile: Action to view a saved profile
saved-profiles-saved-profile: Status label indicating a profile is saved
report-bug-alt-banner: Alt text for the bug report page banner
report-bug-submission: Section/tab label for a single submission
report-bug-heading: Heading encouraging users to submit bug reports
report-bug-title: Field label for the report title
report-bug-title-placeholder: Placeholder example for the report title field
report-bug-description: Field label for the report description
report-bug-status: Column label for the submission status
report-bug-submitted-at: Column label for submission creation date
report-bug-updated-at: Column label for last update date
report-bug-type: Field label for the type of report
report-bug-description-placeholder: Placeholder example for the description field
report-bug-description-informative-text: Helper text explaining how to write a good bug description
report-bug-types-of-reports-informative-: Helper text explaining type options (error, new feature, improvement, test case)
report-bug-submit-button: Submit button label for the bug report form
report-bug-submit-cancel-button: Cancel button label for the bug report form
message-no-submissions: Empty-state text when the user has not sent any messages yet
message-form-hide: Action to hide a message entry
message-form-view: Action to view a message entry
message-form-status: Column or field label for message status
message-form-date: Column or field label for message date
message-form-clean-button: Button to clear the message form
message-banner-page: Page title for the messaging page
message-alt-banner: Alt text for the messaging page banner image
message-form-to-placeholder: Placeholder asking who the message is for
message-form-method-informative-text: Helper text noting the message will be sent via Meta
message-form-subject-informative-text: Helper text guiding how to write the subject
message-form-message-placeholder: Placeholder example for the message body
message-form-email-available: Status label indicating email is available
message-form-email-not-available: Info text when recipient email isn't available; Talk Page will be used
message-form-email-receiver-not-emailabl: Info text when recipient cannot receive emails; Talk Page will be used
message-form-email-sender-not-configured: Info text when sender's email is not configured on Meta-Wiki
message-error-no-email-body: Error dialog body explaining to use Talk Page when email isn’t available
message-button-confirme-and-send: Button to confirm and send the message
message-info-popup-title: Dialog title explaining messages will be sent via Meta
message-info-popup: Dialog body explaining when email vs. Talk Page is used and how replies work
message-error-no-email-title: Error dialog title when email is not available
message-error-use-talkpage-button: Button to switch to Talk Page method
message-error-user-not-found: Error message when the entered username is not found
message-error-user-not-found-body: Detailed message explaining the username wasn't found and to try again
message-sent-send-new-message: Action to start a new message after sending
delete-confirmation-title: Dialog title for confirming deletion of an event from a profile
delete-confirmation-event-title: Field label within delete confirmation: Title
delete-confirmation-capacities: Field label listing capacities in the delete confirmation
delete-confirmation-description: Field label for the event description in the delete confirmation
filters-all-formats: Filter option to include all event formats
message-sent-back-to-home: Action to navigate back to the home page
message-form-informative-text: Helper text describing how to write a message and that email copies are sent
lets-connect-edit-user-info-1: Informational paragraph describing CapX and Let's Connect and what registration enables
lets-connect-edit-user-info-2: Informational paragraph noting unsaved info persists and how to save
lets-connect-form-user-edit: Call to action to sign up to Let's Connect
lets-connect-form-user-button-update-pro: Button to update the user's Let's Connect registration data
lets-connect-form-user-button-back-to-us: Button to return to the user profile
lets-connect-form-heading: Form heading for Let's Connect registration
lets-connect-form-roles: Question asking about the user's main role
lets-connect-form-roles-info: Helper text: choose only one option
lets-connect-form-topic-check: Question asking which topics the user's work relates to (optional)
lets-connect-form-topic-check-text: Helper text: pick up to 2 or add your own
lets-connect-form-gender-identify-not-li: Label for 'Not listed' option in gender identity
lets-connect-form-edit-inputs: Inline action to enable editing a specific field
lets-connect-form-informative-text: Helper text explaining how edits overwrite Let's Connect data and that role is mandatory
lets-connect-back-button: Action to clear unsaved data and go back
lets-connect-form-role-a: Option: Paid staff member of an affiliate/user group
lets-connect-form-role-b: Option: Volunteer staff member of an affiliate/user group
lets-connect-form-role-c: Option: Volunteer organiser working mostly outside user groups
lets-connect-form-role-d: Option: Executive director of an affiliate/user group
lets-connect-form-role-e: Option: Board member of an affiliate/user group
lets-connect-form-role-f: Option: Individual Wikimedian who contributes by editing Wikiprojects
error-fallback-title: Fallback page title when an unrecoverable error occurs
error-fallback-description: Fallback page body explaining an error occurred and to try later
error-fallback-try-again: Action button to retry loading the page
lets-connect-info-popup-title: Dialog title: Just one more step
lets-connect-info-popup-message: Dialog body explaining data sharing with Let's Connect team and linking to privacy statement (contains $1 placeholder for the link)
lets-connect-info-popup-continue: Button to confirm and send the Let's Connect registration
lets-connect-success-popup-close-tab: Button to close the success dialog/tab
lets-connect-success-popup-title: Success dialog title after completing Let's Connect flow
organization-profile-event-url-invalid: Validation message when the event URL is not a valid Meta or WikiLearn URL
organization-profile-event-url-tooltip-u: Helper text describing accepted URLs and that details will be auto-filled
event-form-wikidata-loading: Status text while searching Wikidata for event data
event-form-wikidata-not-found: Error text when no Wikidata data is found for the provided URL
event-form-wikidata-error: Generic error while searching Wikidata for event data
lets-connect-success-popup-info: Informational text reminding the user to click 'Save profile' to persist changes
lets-connect-alt-banner: Alt text for the Let's Connect banner/title
badges-back-to-user-profile: Action to return to the user profile from the badges view
badge-selection-modal-title: Title of the modal where the user chooses which badges to display
body-profile-badges-edit-your-badges: Action to edit which badges are displayed
body-profile-badges-no-badges: Descriptive text stating that the user has no active badges yet
body-profile-badges-title: Section title text for the 'Badges' section in the user profile page
body-profile-badges-description: Short explanatory text about viewing the user's badge collection
alt-logo-main: Alt text for the main CapX logo that navigates to the homepage
alt-logo-loading: Alt text for the CapX logo shown while the page is loading
alt-profile-picture: Alt text for the user's profile picture image
alt-profile-picture-default: Alt text for the default user profile picture image
alt-badge: Alt text for a badge image; includes the badge name in {badgeName}
alt-illustration: Alt text for a generic illustration image
alt-tablet-illustration: Alt text for an illustration of a tablet showing video content
alt-video-thumbnail: Alt text for the video thumbnail introducing CapX
aria-label-loading: Accessible label read while content is loading
aria-label-report-bug-description: Accessible label for the bug report description field
aria-label-report-bug-title: Accessible label for the bug report title field
capacity-selection-modal-select-capacity: Label indicating items are 'Selected' in multi-select mode
Plural label 'Capacities' used in multi-select context
capacity-list-something-went-wrong: Generic error message in the capacity list
capacity-list-an-error: Detailed error message when loading capacities fails
edit-profile-mini-bio-exceeded-chars: Suffix text indicating how many characters were exceeded
edit-profile-mini-bio-remaining-chars: Suffix text indicating how many characters remain
capacity-card-capacity-prefix: Prefix label preceding a capacity name (e.g., 'Capacity:')
capacity-card-visit-metabase: Action to visit the capacity item page on Metabase
capacity-card-visit-wikidata: Action to visit the capacity item page on Wikidata
capacity-card-metabase-logo: Alt text for the Metabase logo
capacity-card-barcode: Alt text/label for a barcode icon
capacity-list-scroll-left: Control to scroll the capacities carousel left
capacity-list-scroll-right: Control to scroll the capacities carousel right
capacity-list-scroll-previous: Control to move to the previous set in a carousel
capacity-list-scroll-next: Control to move to the next set in a carousel
capacity-list-loading-translations: Status text while loading translations for capacities
capacity-list-loading-capacity-data: Status text while loading capacity data (often followed by capacity name)
capacity-list-context-error: Message shown when required context is missing for loading capacities
translation-help-text: Help text explaining how to contribute translations on Metabase
translation-contribute-compact: Prompt inviting users to contribute translations when a capacity is not available in the selected language
translation-contribute-message: Message inviting translation contributions when content is missing in the selected language
translation-needed: Label indicating a translation is needed
translation-help-wanted: Label indicating help is wanted for translations
aria-label-image-loading: Accessible label for an image that is loading
aria-label-loading-spinner: Accessible label for a loading spinner
bug-report-no-submissions: Empty-state text when there are no bug report submissions
capacity-error: Message shown when a capacity fails to load
capacity-unknown: Label when a capacity is unknown or not found
edit-profile-no-projects-found: Message shown when no projects could be found
filters-event-format: Label for the Event format filter
filters-insert-item: Placeholder/label instructing to insert an item
no-events-found: Message shown when no events match the search or filters
organization-not-found: Message shown when an organization could not be found
organization-profile-add-featured: Action to add an item to 'featured'
organization-profile-event-popup-save-ch: Button to save changes in the event dialog
organization-profile-new-event: Label/button for creating a new event
organization-profile-remove-featured: Action to remove an item from 'featured'
aria-language-input: Allows user to select a language
pagination-current-page: Aria/live text announcing the current page number (uses {page})
pagination-first: Pagination control: Go to first page
pagination-last: Pagination control: Go to last page
pagination-pages: Label for the list of page numbers
pagination-of: Connector word 'of' used in pagination UI
profile-deleted-title: Title shown after a profile is successfully deleted
profile-deleted-message: Message confirming the profile was permanently deleted
profile-deleted-submessage: Additional line thanking the user and informing they may create a new account
profile-deleted-ok-button: Button to close the success message (OK)
saved-profiles-filters-button: Button to open filters in the Saved profiles page
select-capacity: Label prompting the user to select a capacity
snackbar-edit-profile-failed: Generic snackbar shown when updating profile fails
snackbar-edit-profile-organization-error: Snackbar: error saving the organization profile
capacity-visualization-title: Title of the interactive capacity visualization page
capacity-visualization-description: Instructions on how to navigate and interact with the capacity visualization
capacity-visualization-reset-button: Button to reset the visualization to the initial view
analytics-bashboard-alt-banner: Alt text for the data analytics page banner
analytics-bashboard-new-users-sub: Subtitle: new users in the last month
analytics-bashboard-capacities-card-lear: Capacity card title: Learning and Evaluation
analytics-bashboard-capacities-card-comm: Capacity card title: Community health initiative
